# open

Open a workspace

## Usage

```console
coder open
```

## Subcommands

| Name                                    | Purpose                             |
|-----------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|
| [<code>vscode</code>](./open_vscode) | Open a workspace in VS Code Desktop |
| [<code>app</code>](./open_app)       | Open a workspace application.       |
